name: dug-svelte-router
description: Implement simple hash-based routing for Svelte apps.
readme: # dug-svelte-router A simple client-side hash-based router for Svelte apps. ``` import Router from 'dug-svelte-router' ``` ## Example ### html ``` Home About Blog ``` This is designed only to work with hash-based routes. ### script ``` ``` To make a route act like a "layout" (have other routes inside of it), add "layout:" to the hash. ### code on the blog page ``` blog 1 blog 2 ``` ``` ``` ## Lifecycle By default, routes are not mounted until they are navigated to. When navigating away from a route, it is not destroyed, but styled to display: none. To force a route to pre-mount on, add mount: true to its route object. To force it to destroy itself, add destroy: true. You can also add the props mountAll={true} and destroyAll={true} to a router component.
